meaningMnemonic: “Bring in the <radical>next</radical> <radical>woman</radical> so that I may examine her <kanji>figure</kanji>!” We’re holding auditions for a commercial and we need to find a woman with a nice figure. The last woman was no good, so bring in the next one.
readingMnemonic: The next woman comes in and you examine her <kanji>figure</kanji>. The figure you've been searching for! It just happens to belong to a <reading>shee</reading>p (し) woman. But she's soft, fluffy, and round. The perfect figure!
